entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -30.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 12:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

Temperature: -30.5°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -33.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
